analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x4d305c2334c02e44ac592bbea681ba4cc1576de3.sol#62)
RepuX.transferLockup should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x4d305c2334c02e44ac592bbea681ba4cc1576de3.sol#217)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/3/0x4d305c2334c02e44ac592bbea681ba4cc1576de3.sol#439-441:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0x4d305c2334c02e44ac592bbea681ba4cc1576de3.sol:
